items.name: Gola Rainforest Skywalk
items.short_description: Experience the canopy of Liberia's pristine Gola Rainforest from an elevated walkway, offering unparalleled views of diverse wildlife and lush flora. A truly immersive eco-adventure.
items.address: Near Sapo National Park, Grand Gedeh County

items.name: National Museum of Liberian Arts & Culture
items.short_description: A modern museum showcasing the rich artistic heritage and diverse cultural traditions of Liberia through interactive exhibits and contemporary art installations, recently expanded and modernized.

items.name: Monrovia Waterfront Promenade
items.short_description: A newly developed scenic boardwalk along the Atlantic coast, offering stunning ocean views, public art installations, and a vibrant space for leisure and community events.

items.name: Liberia Tech Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic center fostering technological advancement and entrepreneurship in Liberia, featuring co-working spaces, tech workshops, and a public exhibit area showcasing local innovations.

items.name: Cape Mount Eco-Beach Retreat
items.short_description: A sustainable beachfront resort offering pristine sands, water sports, and guided nature walks through nearby coastal forests, focusing on responsible tourism and local conservation efforts.

items.name: ELWA Junction Food & Craft Market
items.short_description: A newly established bustling market offering a wide array of local street food, handmade crafts, and fresh produce, providing a vibrant cultural experience and supporting local vendors.

items.name: Liberian Primate Sanctuary & Research Center
items.short_description: Dedicated to the rescue and rehabilitation of Liberia's endangered primate species, visitors can observe these animals in natural habitats and learn about vital conservation efforts.

items.name: Farmington River Adventure Park
items.short_description: An exciting outdoor park featuring ziplining across the Farmington River, kayaking, and hiking trails, perfect for thrill-seekers and nature lovers of all ages.

items.name: Peace & Reconciliation Memorial Garden
items.short_description: A serene and reflective space dedicated to Liberia's journey towards lasting peace, featuring symbolic sculptures, tranquil pathways, and educational plaques detailing the nation's history.

items.name: Ducor Central Park & Botanical Gardens
items.short_description: A revitalized urban green oasis in the heart of Monrovia, offering landscaped gardens, walking paths, children's play areas, and a community space for relaxation and events.
items.address: Broad Street, Monrovia (near Ducor Hotel site)
